import React from "react"; const BotCard = ({ bot, onAddBot,onRelease, onDischarge }) => { const [show, setShow] = React.useState(true); return (
{show &&
Toggle Challenge
}

{bot.name}

Id: {bot.id}
Bot Class: {bot.bot_class}
Health: {bot.health}
Damage: {bot.damage}
Armor: {bot.armor}
Created At: {bot.created_at}
Updated At: {bot.updated_at}
); }; export default BotCard;
